message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value, I'm starting the bidding at $1,800,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,800,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,000,000 is too low for a product of this caliber. I'm willing to come down to $1,500,000. This reflects the true value and potential of the product.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1,500,000 is still above my comfortable price point. I'm willing to go up to $1,100,000. This offer is fair given my budget and the value I place on the product.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer. To bridge the gap, I'm willing to accept $1,300,000. This is my final offer, as it significantly discounts the true value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but $1,300,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1,250,000. This is a good compromise, and it allows me to stay within my financial limits. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to look elsewhere for the product.
